name: Princess Dreams
description:
A modern Action RPG in the vein of Secret of Mana. 

A young Princess decides that she is bored of her secluded life at boarding school and decides to escape. Her escape attempt turns into an attempted kidnapping and the princess must flee, alone, to the nearby city. There she discovers that something is terribly wrong. The people just don't care.

Unable to sit by and watch this come to pass, Bea vows to get to the bottom of this mass apathy, and she won't let anyone get in her way.
